messages.en: It's signs of Ore Disease pathogenesis——!

messages.zh: 具体回答起来太复杂了，但至少她的情况非常危险......
messages.en: The answer is complicated, but at least it’s very dangerous for her now……

messages.zh: 这样下去，短时间内，矿石病就可能威胁到她的生命。
messages.en: If this goes on, Ore Disease will threaten her life any time soon.

messages.zh: 只能先应急处理一下......对米莎的病情控制刻不容缓。
messages.en: We can only give her some emergency treatment now……Misha is in urgent need of therapy.

messages.zh: 必须向龙门声明这一点。事件平息之后，我们必须把米莎接回罗德岛。
messages.en: We must state that Lungmen. After this is over, we must take Misha back to Rhodes Island.

messages.zh: 这是我们对任务目标的责任。
messages.en: This is our responsibility to our mission target.
Ouch! That hurts! Why hit me……

messages.zh: 如果有一天我快爆了，我一定会努力爬到你身边的。
messages.en: If one day I’m about to explode, I’ll try my best to crawl to your sides.

messages.zh: 对不起！芙兰卡小姐！以前多有得罪请原谅我！
messages.en: I’m sorry! Miss Franka! Please forgive my past offenses!

messages.zh: 先把目标转移到安全的地区吧。
messages.en: Let’s escort the target to safety first.

messages.zh: 顺便，我们后方有些情况。
messages.en: By the way, we’ve got some actions behind us.
What do you want!! Get out!!

messages.zh: 大家都是感染者，我们不想动粗！别挡路！
messages.en: We’re all Infected, we don’t want to do this the hard way! Move!

messages.zh: 你已经毁了我们的家，现在还要把近卫局引过来吗！别想过去！！
messages.en: You’ve already destroyed our homes, are you going to lead the Guard Bureau here now! You’re not getting past here!

messages.zh: 你......！不识时务的家伙，快滚开！！
（看来他们是跟丢了。现在动手的话，罗德岛会暴露行踪。）
messages.en: It seems that they’ve lost track of us. If we attack now, we’ll give ourselves away.

messages.zh: （会不会干扰到任务进程？如果会，后果有多严重？）
messages.en: Will it disturb the mission? If so, to what extend?

messages.zh: 如果条件允许，罗德岛救助感染者是理所当然的。
messages.en: If circumstances allow, Rhodes Island will help the Infected without hesitation.

messages.zh: 果然当初选择跟着你是正确的。
messages.en: It was right to choose to follow you.

messages.zh: 那是什么意思......芙兰卡小姐？
该教训一下这帮为非作歹的家伙了。
messages.en: Time to teach a lesson to those evil bastards.
